content: It seems pontoon does not invalidate translation when the term has changed, is that intended? (here by term I mean the English version) Looking through our Polish translations I noticed some approved translations don't really fit the English version anymore. What should I do in such cases? It would be really tedious to check all translations to make sure it still matches the English term
@Marcin Wojnarowski it does not, the way it's intended to be used is that when the text is changed the IDs should be updated with a number next to them
if there are minor differences it's no biggie, but if things are changing semantically we should absolutely be adding a number to the ids
